pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measuring Stakeholder Influence // Proposes an original instrument for measuring stakeholder influence on the development of an infrastructure project that is carried through by a municipality, drawing on stakeholder classifications (Mitchell, Agle, Wood, 1997) and input-output modelling (Hester Adams, 2013). Mitchell R., Agle B.R., Wood D.J. doi:10.2307/259247 Hester, P.T., Adams, K.M. (2013) doi:10.1016/j.procs.2013.09.282.
